text: "Last Goodbye" is a song by Swedish band Da Buzz. It reached number one on the Swedish Singles Chart on 9 March 2006. It is the first single from the album of the same name and was released as a three track CD single by Bonnier Music on 22 February 2006. ==Track listing== #"Last Goodbye" (Radio Edit) - 3:15 #"Last Goodbye" (von der Burg Radio Edit) - 3:13 #"Last Goodbye" (von der Burg Extended) - 5:00 ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable" !Chart (2006) !Peak position |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {|class="wikitable" !Chart (2006) !Position |- |Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) |align="center"|60 |} ==References== Category:2006 singles Category:2006 songs Category:Da Buzz songs Category:Number-one singles in Sweden Category:Songs written by Per Lidén
title: Last Goodbye (Da Buzz song)
